Dated: {{ frappe.utils.now_datetime().strftime("%d %b, %Y") or ""}}

 

 

To,

{{doc.applicant_name or ""}}

Sub:Offer Letter

 

 

Dear {{doc.applicant_name or ""}} ,

 

We are pleased to offer you the position of ‘{{doc.designation or ""}}’. Given below are the specific terms and conditions of our Offer – Please read these important details carefully, including your compensation details.

 

Joining Acceptance and Commencement

Your Appointment will be effective on or before your joining date i.e {{frappe.utils.getdate(frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{'job_applicant':doc.job_applicant},"date_of_joining")).strftime("%d %b, %Y") or ""}}. Please contact us if you need an alternate joining date. If you do not confirm your acceptance within 2 days of receipt of this letter, this Offer will be withdrawn. Your joining location will be Head Office {{frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{'job_applicant':doc.job_applicant},"branch") or ""}}, India.

 

Terms of Engagement

Salary / Remuneration:

1. Your total cost to the Company shall be INR. {{data.total_fixed_pay_annually or ""}}/- ({{frappe.utils.money_in_words(data.total_fixed_pay_annually) or ""}}) per annum. The details of your compensation are given in the annexure at the end of this letter.

2. Your Salary will be paid on the first week of each month and if required is subject to any Tax and other statutory deductions as applicable.

3. You will appreciate that information relating to your remuneration package is strictly confidential and hence request you maintain this confidentiality.

4. In the event of any Tax liability or any other tax liability inclusive of any statutory charges arising out of your employment with Avisys Services, these will be borne by your selves and Avisys Services shall in no event be liable for payment of these taxes or any other charges of this nature for the period of your employment or after cessation of your employment with Avisys Services.

5. Your Transfers can be done anywhere within the Avisys Group and hence you shall be getting the salary as per Indian Annexure if working from India and as per Bahrain if working from Bahrain (Middle East).

6. Your appointment is contingent upon satisfactory reference & background checks including verification of your application materials, education and employment history.

7. It is your responsibility to notify the Company of any changes in your personal information within 3 working days. All notices shall be considered duly and properly delivered to the address on file with the Company.

8. During your service with the Company, you are expected to devote your whole time and attention to the Company’s affairs and refrain from directly or indirectly engaging in any other Company / Business.

9. Information pertaining to Avisys operations and intellectual property is confidential and you will sign a non – disclosure agreement. If you are bound by a confidentiality agreement with a previous employer, you must notify the Company and indemnify the Company against any breach thereof.

10. Performance Evaluation will take place once a year to assess Employee’s overall performance.

11. Your remuneration will be subject to annual review, or at such times as may be appropriate. Review dates are set by Avisys Executive committee. Avisys operates a Pay-for-Performance policy and the result of any remuneration review will take your performance into account.

12. Your designation is merely indicative of the responsibilities, which you are required to carry out. The Company shall require of you at any time to perform any other administrative, managerial, supervisory or any other functions relevant to your Role and Responsibility.

13. Either party will be entitled to terminate the contract of employment by giving 2 months’ notice. Any unused and accrued Leave cannot be adjusted against the notice period.

14. You will retire from the services of the Company on attaining the age of 60 years.

 

Regd. Office : 16, Sumedha Society, Behind Aditya Shagun Mall, Bandhan, Pune-411021 CIN : U72900PN2019PTC186794

{% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%} {% if print_settings.repeat_header_footer %}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}{%- endif %}

15. In the unlikely event of separation with the company within 12 months from the date of joining, all payments incurred by Avisys at the time of joining process of the Employee (whichever applicable) needs to be refunded back to Avisys as per actuals.

16. At the time of separation from Avisys, the Employee agrees to sign an Undertaking assuring Avisys that he / she will not seek or accept any employment for a period of One year, as a direct Employee or a Consultant with any Avisys Clients that the Employee has worked for the past one year prior to his relieving / termination from Avisys.

17. It must be specifically understood that this offer is made based on your proficiency in Technical/ Professional skills you have declared to possess as per the application, and on the ability to handle any assignment independently anywhere in India or overseas. In case, at a later date, any of your statements/ particulars furnished are found to be false or misleading, the Company shall have the right to terminate your services forthwith without the notice period or pay in lieu of notice period.

18. The Appointment and its continuance is subjected to your being found and remaining medically (physically and mentally) fit. The Company reserves the right to ask you to undergo medical examination if and when considered necessary.

19. Please note that during the tenure of your work with Avisys Services in India, you may also be relocated to any place in India or outside India and as such you may at any time be Transferred / Seconded to any of the offices of the Company, its associates, organizations with whom the Company has transactions, whether the office is subsidiary, associate or the organization is in existence today or is to be setup hereafter. While every attempt will be made to give you reasonable advance notice of such transfer, however in case of emergency such transfers may be made effective immediately.

20. When posted to an overseas location for an assignment, the remuneration and benefits as applicable to such an assignment shall be mentioned along with your Secondment / Transfer Letter. The duration of an overseas assignment is governed by the customer and your own performance.

21. On your Transfer / Secondment to any other place of work, you will observe the working timings and holidays as applicable to the location and place of work where you have been transferred / seconded.

Intellectual Property Rights

22. As part of the employment you will acquire or develop confidential and proprietary information concerning the Company and its method of dealings with its customers - and their clients or end-users. You are expected to maintain utmost secrecy in regard to the affairs of the Company and shall keep confidential any information, instruments, documents, etc., relating to the Company that may come to your professional knowledge as an Employee of the Company.

23. You will, at all times, observe secrecy in respect of any technical, trade or business data or any other information that might come to your knowledge or possession, which according to Company, are not necessarily confidential and form valuable property of the Company and not made available to the trade and furthermore, you will not disclose them without authority of the Company to anyone other than the Company’s Officers authorized to receive them and shall not disclose them to anyone.

24. If during the period of your employment with us you will achieve any invention, process improvement, operational improvement or other processes/methods, likely to result in more efficient operation of any of the activities of the Company, the Company shall be entitled to use, utilize and exploit such improvements and you shall assign all your rights to the Company for the purpose of seeking any patent rights in respect thereof for any other purpose.

25. You will assign the Company right, title and interest in any invention or improvement that you might make solely or jointly in the course of your relating to the products/services marketed, based, developed and you will perform any acts, execute such documents without expenses to you which in the judgment of the Company may be needful or desirable to secure to the Company, may be needful or desirable to secure to the Company patent protection and any/all rights relating to invention or improvements.

26. Upon leaving the Company, you will not take any drawing, blue print or other reproduction or other data, tables, calculations, letters or documents or any other writing or copy of writing of any nature whatsoever pertaining to the business of the Company or any of its subsidiaries. The Company will take legal action if incase the Employee is found to disclose the Company or Client’s source code, data, any of the above or what might seem against the business of the Company or its Clients etc.

27. You will maintain and keep in your safe custody such books, registers, documents and other papers as may be issued to you or may come in your possession and shall return the same when required.

 

Regd. Office : 16, Sumedha Society, Behind Aditya Shagun Mall, Bandhan, Pune-411021 CIN : U72900PN2019PTC186794

28. Please ensure that on the day of reporting you will bring the following documents for our verification and records:

  1. Educational Qualifications and Certifications.
  2. Experience Certificates.
  3. Copy of Passport.
  4. Copy of Bank Statements for 3 months reflecting Salary details
  5. Last 3 years Income Tax Returns
  6. Relieving Letter from the last Employer.
  7. Last Pay Certificate and Details of TDS (Income Certificate) made
  8. Particulars of PF Account, if held.
  9. 2 Passport sized photographs for your Dossier and Identity Card.
  10. Copy of your PAN Card

Any other documents required will be intimated to you later.

Please sign on our copy of this letter as acceptance of this Offer.

 

Yours Sincerely,

 

 

 

 

For Avisys Services Private Limited

Date: {{ frappe.utils.now_datetime().strftime("%d %b, %Y") or ""}}

 

Sub: Transfer Letter                                       ({{frappe.utils.getdate(doc.transfer_date).strftime("%d %b, %Y") or ""}})

 

To,

{{doc.employee_name or ""}}

{% if frappe.db.get_value("Employee",doc.employee,"current_address") -%}

({{frappe.db.get_value("Employee",doc.employee,"current_address") or ""}})

{% elif frappe.db.get_value("Employee",doc.employee,"permanent_address") -%}

({{frappe.db.get_value("Employee",doc.employee,"permanent_address") or ""}})

{% endif %}

Dear {{frappe.db.get_value("Employee",doc.employee,"first_name")}},

 

This is to inform you that you have been transferred to our ({{data['department'][1] or ""}}) and your joining date will be ({{frappe.utils.getdate(doc.transfer_date).strftime("%d %b, %Y") or ""}}). Your last working day with ({{data['department'][0] or ""}}) would be ({{data['date'] or ""}}). Your earlier designation as per your appointment letter dated ({{frappe.utils.getdate(frappe.db.get_value("Employee",doc.employee,"date_of_joining")).strftime("%d %b, %Y") or ""}}) was “{{data['designation'][0] or ""}}” and after transfer you will be working as “{{data['designation'][1] or ""}}”. Your Employee Id, salary structure and other perks would remain the same.

Your employment will be governed by the earlier employment agreement as well as the applicable rules, regulations, and policies of the Company.

We believe you have a successful career ahead of you.

Thanking you,

 

Avisys Services

Reference: Avisys/Confirmation/{{doc.name}}

Date: {{ frappe.utils.now_datetime().strftime("%d %b, %Y") }}

 

To {{doc.applicant_name}}

 

Confirmation Letter

 

Dear {{doc.applicant_name}},

 

We are pleased inform you that your performance assessment is successfully submitted by your immediate reporting manager, with the performance you have shown during your period of service. We are hereby confirming your services with effect from Date {{frappe.utils.getdate(doc.offer_date).strftime("%d %b, %Y")}}

Other terms and conditions of the HRD Policy shall remain unchanged.

Kindly sign the duplicate copy of this letter in token of you having understood and agreed the terms mentioned herein.

We wish you all the best and look forward to a happy and successful association with us. We are sure that you will put in all increased efforts to perform your duties to the best of your abilities and in the interest of the Company.

We now look forward to your full-hearted devotion to our organization.

 

Yours Sincerely,

 

 

 

 

For Avisys Services Private Limited

 

Name & signature of Employee

Regd. Office : 16, Sumedha Society, Behind Aditya Shagun Mall, Bandhan, Pune-411021 CIN : U72900PN2019PTC186794

{% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%} {% if print_settings.repeat_header_footer %}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}{%- endif %} {%- set data = get_table_data_for_promotion(doc) -%}

 

Date: {{ frappe.utils.now_datetime().strftime("%d %b, %Y") }}

 

To ,

{{doc.employee_name}}

 

Sub:Salary Increment Letter

 

 

 

Dear {{doc.employee_name}},
